Name: EEG data offline and online during motor imagery for standing and sitting
ReferencesAndLinks: Triana-Guzman N, Orjuela-Cañon AD, Jutinico AL, Mendoza-Montoya O and Antelis JM (2022) Decoding EEG rhythms offline and online during motor imagery for standing and sitting based on a brain-computer interface. Front. Neuroinform. 16:961089. https://doi.org/10.3389/fninf.2022.961089
HowToAcknowledge: Triana-Guzman N, Orjuela-Cañon AD, Jutinico AL, Mendoza-Montoya O and Antelis JM (2024). EEG data offline and online during motor imagery for standing and sitting. OpenNeuro Dataset ds005342. doi: doi:10.18112/openneuro.ds005342.v1.0.3
